ygData.subject: Re: Solon's Song of the Sirens bugged?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, most of the time it doesn t seem to reattack for me either unless the mob attacks me or one of my group members.  In sol a i ve seen the goblins not even
ygData.messageBody:
Well, most of the time it doesn't seem to reattack for
me either unless the mob attacks me or one of my group
members. In sol a i've seen the goblins not even
re-attack even if my group members get attacked. In
kedge keep the lancer swordfish seem to re-attack when
myself or a group member is attacked.

If I'm in a place where I can target easily I just
retarget the mob to kill and say press /pet attack
hotkey. Or you can f8 to get nearest mob then press
/pet attack key.

Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
33rd level bard

> Message: 3
> Date: Sun, 06 Feb 2000 21:08:52 +0100
> From: =?iso-8859-1?Q?Bj=F6rn?= Karlowsky
> <pille@...>
> Subject: Solon's Song of the Sirens bugged?
>
> Hello Bards!
>
> Today I experienced problems with charming. While
> charming hadden and
> sticking him onto axe I noticed that he won't follow
> my orders after
> charm broke and doing the recharm.
> Same happened in everfrost, charming an icy orc and
> sticking him onto
> Redwind.
> I successfully tried with a snake an rat though.
> Whats wrong? Does
> anyone know?
> Do blue/white etc. NPC forget our orders now?
>
> puzzled,
> Tirc.
